divs: sighting detailswhile heading due north on county rd 136 i noticed 2 orbs hovering about 500 to 1000 ft above the treeline ( 1 large 1 above the smaller 1 ) they were about half the size of a full moon, about 1 mile away toward the east. shortly after i saw directly in front of me what appeard as a meteor but was neon blue in color and was bright enough to light the dashboard of my car and apperd to land about 1 1\2 miles away i was on the way to babysit my grand children when this happend. i was driving. the size of the orbs were amazingly large compared to the stars. i could not stop as i had to be there at 10 till 5am was in a hurry. i saw them out the winddow for about 15 mins as i drove on hwy 136
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Cookeville
There were no other sightings in Cookeville on or around June 26th 2012
Summary: 2 orbs and a neon blue meteor
